name: 邱垂昱
objective: Operational Research (OR) is a discipline to aid decision making and improving efficiency of the system by applying advanced analytical methods.This course discusses the related methods which include linear programming, transportation and assignment problems, network analysis, dynamic programming and metaheuristics.
schedule:
week 1) Introduction
week 2) Overview of How Operations Research and Analytics Professionals Analyze Problems
week 3) Introduction to Linear Programming
week 4) Solving Linear Programming Problems: The Simplex Method
week 5) The Theory of the Simplex Method
week 6) Duality Theory
week 7-8) The Transportation and Assignment Problems
week 9) Mid-term examination
week 10) Network Optimization Models
week 11) Dynamic Programming
week 12-16) Metaheuristics
week 17-18) Term Project Presentation
scorePolicy:
30% Homework Assignments, Class Participation and Discussion
30% Midterm Exam
40% Final report and presentation
materials: Hillier and Lieberman, Introduction to Operations Research, McGraw-Hill Education
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）
